creator: Game Grig
descriptionHtml:
The Grand Merge is all about growing and merging different products and objects.
Working on a farm, taking care of the birds and animals, restoring the land.
You can produce and sell everything that you’ve merged on your farm, make money and build a mansion of your dreams.

In The Grand Merge you:
• GROW & MERGE the plants, trees, berries and many more objects. Become a farm and merge master!
• GATHER & PRODUCE. Harvest the crops and create goods - flour, jams, cookies, ice creams, smoothies and more.
• SELL & DELIVER the goods you’ve produced. There is a market where mergers and farmers can offer their fantastic products and complete the orders.
• CREATE & DECORATE the mansion of your dreams. Have you ever dreamed of a big beautiful home? With the money you get from your products build your own place. Let it look as you want - cozy and spacious, beautiful and modern, warm and full of love!
• FOLLOW the STORY. Download and get to know the stories of characters - secrets, drama, love - you can find everything in The Grand Merge!
• AND MORE ADVENTURES, TRAVELS AND CHALLENGES are waiting for you.

Get The Grand Merge and start to enjoy the dream world now!
descriptionShort: Match objects, repair the farm, do mansion makeover. Become a real merge master!
